description:
Kane, Yamanaka and Iwashima challenge Kiyo to a series of physical contest, wagering sumptuous side dishes from the school lunch on each event. Meanwhile, Penny, a cute girl mamodo, and Uri, her Book’s owner, arrive, looking for Zatch.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itoshi no Gash! Watashi wa Patie!
愛しのガッシュ! 私はパティ!
